# 50-microservice.txt - AUTOGENERATED, DO NOT MODIFY MANUALLY

# Set up microservice
RUN wget -q -O common-tosca-inventory-1.1.0-SNAPSHOT-linux64.tar.gz "https://nexus.open-o.org/service/local/repositories/snapshots/content/org/openo/common-tosca/inventory/standalone/1.1.0-SNAPSHOT/standalone-1.1.0-20161102.141530-11-linux64.tar.gz" && tar -xf common-tosca-inventory-1.1.0-SNAPSHOT-linux64.tar.gz && rm -f common-tosca-inventory-1.1.0-SNAPSHOT-linux64.tar.gz
EXPOSE 8203
EXPOSE 3306
RUN echo Open-O common-tosca-inventory 1.1.0-SNAPSHOT "https://nexus.open-o.org/service/local/repositories/snapshots/content/org/openo/common-tosca/inventory/standalone/1.1.0-SNAPSHOT/standalone-1.1.0-20161102.141530-11-linux64.tar.gz" > OPENO_VERSION
